title: Children and adolescents, including Milton Swan Jr. second from left, Leon Clark wearing light colored buttoned shirt near left, Sharon Goode with bicycle, Alan Bates wearing striped shirt in middle on opposite side of fence, Millie Williams wearing t-shirt with light colored trim in center rear, and Raymond "Ray" Saunders wearing Dept. Parks and Recreation t-shirt in center, gathered at Madison Elementary School playground across from Herron Hill Park
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
